amendment.description: To provide for a point of order against any appropriations bill that fails to fully fund the construction of the Southwest border fence.

action.text: Amendment SA 969 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 969 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 61. Record Vote Number: 150.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 969.

Amendment SA 969 proposed by Senator Sessions. (consideration: CR S4285-4286; text: CR S4285) To provide for a point of order against any appropriations bill that fails to fully fund the construction of the Southwest border fence.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 969 proposed by Senator Sessions.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to waive the Budget Act with respect to amendment SA 969 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 36 - 61. Record Vote Number: 150.
